SELECT t.*,IF(t.BIZ_TYPE=1,ftd.ACCOUNT,bt.ACCOUNT) as ACCOUNT,m.USERNAME,a.ADD_TIME,a.RED_TYPE,a.USE_TIME, fix.CONTRACT_NO AS FIXCONTRACT_NO,rocky.CONTRACT_NO AS ROCKYCONTRACT_NO, (select c.VALUE from rocky_configuration c where c.NAME =a.RED_TYPE AND c.STATUS=0 and c.type=1900 limit 1) AS SOURCE, (select rc.VALUE from rocky_configuration rc where rc.NAME =m.SOURCE AND rc.STATUS=0 and rc.type=1101 limit 1) AS memberSource FROM( SELECT RED_ID,MONEY,BIZ_ID,BIZ_TYPE,USEBIZ_ID,USER_ID FROM t_red_envelop_account_log WHERE `STATUS`in(3,4) GROUP BY RED_ID,USEBIZ_ID HAVING COUNT(RED_ID)=2 )t LEFT JOIN t_fix_borrow fix on t.USEBIZ_ID=fix.ID and t.BIZ_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN rocky_borrow rocky on t.USEBIZ_ID=rocky.ID and t.BIZ_TYPE=3 LEFT JOIN t_fix_tender_detail ftd ON ftd.ID=t.BIZ_ID AND t.BIZ_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord bt ON bt.ID=t.BIZ_ID AND t.BIZ_TYPE=3 LEFT JOIN rocky_member m on t.USER_ID = m.ID JOIN t_red_envelop_account a on a.ID = t.RED_ID and a.`STATUS`=4
order by a.USE_TIME DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM( SELECT RED_ID,MONEY,BIZ_ID,BIZ_TYPE,USEBIZ_ID,USER_ID FROM t_red_envelop_account_log WHERE `STATUS`in(3,4) GROUP BY RED_ID,USEBIZ_ID HAVING COUNT(RED_ID)=2 )t LEFT JOIN rocky_member m on t.USER_ID = m.ID JOIN t_red_envelop_account a on a.ID = t.RED_ID and a.`STATUS`=4
